channel.title: PacketFilter on Robert Fleming's CIT Blog
channel.description: Recent content in PacketFilter on Robert Fleming's CIT Blog

item.title: CIT 481 blog 10
item.description: Introduction For my final blog I have ironically came back to the start of my CIT college career. As it would turn out, my final lab for COMP 424 is very closely related to a task I completed in my very first CIT class as well as many times for personal use. The lab however had some slight modifications that made the process not exactly one to one. Lab Requirements For this lab we were required to setup the OpenSSH on our FreeBSD guest environment, and connect to the machine from the host environment after some configuration. These required configurations were:
